page.title: 02ROADS AND COMMUNICATIONS.
page.content: 1 The main road that links Abberley with towns of importance is the A443 from{WORCESTER to TENBURY.}Worcester is 12 miles from Abberley and Tenbury Wells is 10 miles away.This road winds through a most picturesque valley, following the {RIVER TEME }(a tributary of the {RIVER SEVERN.)} { STOURPORT}and {KIDDERMINSTER}are the two other main towns of direct communication.These towns are approached by taking the A451 at { {GREAT WITLEY}. The B4202 passes through the middle of the village linking the A443 with { {PENSAX} and {CLOWS TOP}-some three miles away. Public transport links with Worcester twice daily and with Stourport and Kidderminster twice weekly (private contractor).
